alert.note: Alert for Ashe; Watauga; Wilkes (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wilkes, eastern Watauga and southwestern Ashe Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Todd, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boone... Deep Gap... Todd... Darby... Wilkesboro Reservoir... Buck... and Rutherwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
